name: Legend of Dungeon
summary:
Legend of Dungeon is a randomly generated action RPG Beat'em'up with heavy Rogue-like elements, striking visuals, and dynamic music.

* 1 to 4 Player Cooperative Gameplay (same PC, multiple controllers) 
* Randomized Dungeon 
* Full Controller support
* Real-Time Beat'em'up style combat 
* Permadeath (with 2+ players, you become a ghost, and collect spirit orbs * to resurrect) 
* Randomized Dynamic Music built from over 300 tracks! 
* Dynamically Shaded Pixel Art! 
* Unlockable Classes
* Tameable Pets
* VR Mode!
* Online Score Board 
* Awesome Weapons and Magic! 
* Creepy Monsters and Bosses 
* Made in Unity - For Windows, Mac and Linux! Android ports coming soon!
